title: Trends with Benefits: Microsoft’s hardware gamble, AI takeover, drones galore
text:
Trends with Benefits: Microsoft’s hardware gamble, AI takeover, drones galore 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Microsoft is suddenly a hardware company, and 1 million new drones are expected to be buzzing in American skies come Christmas. What's next,...
